spell_tooltip.description:
You have a chance to become Enraged while you are suffering movement impairing effects.

Suffering loss of control effects have a chance to grant you Recklessness for 5 sec.
Rampage, Onslaught, and Odyn's Fury damage reduce healing the target receives by 3% for 12 sec, stacking up to 12 times.
Run at high speed at a distance in front of you. All enemies in your path will take 62,943 Physical damage and be knocked back.

An aggressive combat state that increases the damage of your auto-attacks by 15% and reduces the duration of Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects on you by 10%.

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 20% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 52,363 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 21,442 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 25,864 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Rampage has a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 17,776 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Cooldown of Enraged Regeneration, Pummel, Intervene, Spell Reflection, and Storm Bolt reduced by 5%.
Bloodthirst deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Stamina increased by 20% and Armor increased by 20%.
Slam and Whirlwind deal 20% more damage and 10% increased critical strike damage.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
If Whirlwind hits 3 or more enemies it hits them 1 additional time for 30% damage.
While dual wielding your damage is increased by 12% and movement speed is increased by 8%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.
Gain Strength equal to 20% of your Armor.
Roar explosively, dealing 228,308 Physical damage to enemies within 12 yds and cause them to bleed for 285,837 physical damage over 8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Transform into a colossus for 20 sec, causing you to deal 20% increased damage and removing all roots and snares.

Generates 10 Rage.
Thunderous Roar's cooldown reduced by 45 sec.
While Avatar is active Rampage's Rage cost is reduced by 20 and Bloodthirst's cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec.

Assault the target in a bloodthirsty craze, dealing 322,132 Physical damage and restoring 3% of your health.

Generates 10 Rage.

A mighty blow with both weapons that deals a total of 379,666 Physical damage.

Raging Blow has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.

Generates 14 Rage.
Enrage increases your Haste by 15% and increases your movement speed by 10%.
Reduces damage taken by 30% and Bloodthirst restores an additional 20% health for 8 sec. Usable while stunned or incapacitated.
Execute no longer costs Rage and now generates 20 Rage.
Bloodthirst always Enrages you the first time you strike a target and it has a 15% increased chance to trigger Enrage.
You take 10% reduced damage while Enrage is active.
Your attacks have a chance to reset the cooldown of Execute and make it usable on any target, regardless of their health.
While Enraged, your auto-attacks can no longer miss.
Enrages you and unleashes a series of 4 brutal strikes for a total of 457,800 Physical damage.
Raging Blow has 2 charges and has a 25% chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Bloodthirst critical strikes generate 4 additional Rage and inflict a Gushing Wound that leeches 109,499 health over 6 sec.
Rampage increases your Haste by 2% for 12 sec, stacking up to 4 times. This effect is reset if you Rampage a different primary target.
Raging Blow causes every strike of your next Rampage to deal an additional 20% damage, stacking up to 5 times.

Whirlwind causes your next 4 single-target attacks to strike up to 4 additional targets for 55% damage.

Whirlwind generates 3 Rage, plus an additional 1 per target hit. Maximum 8 Rage.
Raging Blow increases the critical strike chance of your next Bloodthirst by 15% until it critically strikes, stacking up to 5 times.
Go berserk, increasing all Rage generation by 100% and granting your abilities 20% increased critical strike chance for 12 sec.
Execute is now usable on targets below 35% health and its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec.
Raging Blow deals 15% increased damage and while Enraged, Raging Blow has a 10% increased chance to instantly reset its own cooldown.
Whirlwind deals 25% more damage and affects your next 4 single-target attacks.
Mastery increased by 4% and if you are Enraged, Bloodthirst extends your Enrage by 2.0 sec.
Haste increased by 4% and Raging Blow and Bloodthirst generate an additional 4 Rage.
Critical Strike chance increased by 4% and Raging Blow's critical strikes deal 20% increased damage.

Become an unstoppable storm of destructive force, striking all nearby enemies for 1 million Physical damage over 3.2 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

You are immune to movement impairing and loss of control effects, but can use defensive abilities and can avoid attacks.

Generates 10 Rage each time you deal damage.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.

Unleashes your power, dealing 489,247 Physical damage and an additional 192,158 Physical damage over 4 sec to all enemies within 12 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Generates 15 Rage.
Odyn's Fury increases your auto-attack damage and speed by 30% for 10 sec.

Your attacks against your primary target have a high chance to overwhelm their defenses and trigger a Slayer's Strike, dealing 296,592 damage and applying Marked for Execution, increasing the damage they take from your next Execute by 15%. Stacks 3 times.

Every 3 Slayer's Strikes you gain Sudden Death.

Using Sudden Death accelerates your next Bladestorm, striking 1 additional time (max 3). Bladestorm's total duration is unchanged.
Each strike of Bladestorm applies Overwhelmed to all enemies affected, increasing damage you deal to them by 1% for 20 sec, max 10 stacks.

Charge increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

Charge removes all movement impairing effects, this effect cannot occur more than once every 30 sec.
You heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sudden Death.
Each strike of Bladestorm deals an additional 10% damage evenly split across all targets.
When Raging Blow resets its own cooldown, your next Raging Blow deals 20% additional damage and 20% additional critical damage.
Marked for Execution increases the critical strike chance and critical strike damage of your next Execute on the target by 15%.
Bloodthirst has a 20% chance to cause you to unleash a flurry of steel, striking all nearby enemies for 337,314 damage and applying Overwhelmed. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.
Raging Blow damage increased by 30%.

When you Execute a target that you've Marked for Execution, you both reduce the cooldown of Bladestorm by 5 sec and apply 2 stacks of Overwhelmed to the target per stack of Marked for Execution consumed.

You can use Pummel and Storm Bolt while Bladestorming.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.
Movement speed increased by 5%.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 52,655 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 20,939 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 25,404 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Reduces the cooldown of Heroic Leap by 15 sec and Heroic Leap also increases your movement speed by 70% for 3 sec.

When you take any damage, heal for 2.0% of your maximum health. 

This can only occur once every 10 sec.
Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 110,143 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Raise your weapon, reflecting the first spell cast on you and reducing magic damage you take by 20% for 5 sec.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 17,968 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Thunder Clap's radius is increased by 50% and it reduces affected target's movement speed by an additional 20%.
Cooldown of Enraged Regeneration, Pummel, Intervene, Spell Reflection, and Storm Bolt reduced by 5%.
Maximum Rage increased by 30.
Shockwave's range increased by 6 yards and when it strikes at least 3 targets its cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Stamina increased by 10% and Armor increased by 10%.
Charge gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.
While wielding one-handed weapons your damage is increased by 3% and Leech increased by 2%.
Haste increased by 4% and your auto-attack critical strikes increase your auto-attack speed by 40% for 10 sec.

Throw a spear at the target location, dealing 215,535 Physical damage instantly and an additional 248,122 damage over 4 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Enemies hit are chained to the spear's location for the duration.

Generates 10 Rage.
Activating Avatar or Shield Wall grants 4 sec of the other.

Fight through the pain, ignoring 50% of damage taken until 561,618 damage has been prevented.

Repeated uses of Ignore Pain accumulate, up to 2.5 million total damage prevented.

Swing in a wide arc, dealing 57,729 Physical damage to all enemies in front of you. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Your successful dodges and parries have a chance to make your next Revenge cost no Rage.
Demoralizes all enemies within 10 yards, reducing the damage they deal to you by 20% for 8 sec.
Your auto-attacks deal an additional 39,305 Physical damage and have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Increases maximum health by 30% for 15 sec and instantly heals you for that amount.
Defensive Stance additionally reduces magic damage you take by 6%.
Devastate, Thunder Clap, Revenge, and Execute have a 25% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Shield Slam.
Last Stand increases your Rage generation by 50%.
Taunts all enemies within 10 yds to attack you for 6 sec.
Wounds the target, causing 35,246 Physical damage instantly and an additional 119,989 Bleed damage over 15 sec.
10% of damage you deal adds to your active Ignore Pain.

Increases the radius of Demoralizing Shout by 5 yards.

Each enemy hit by Thunder Clap reduces the remaining cooldown on Demoralizing Shout by 1.5 sec, up to 4.5 sec.
Reduces all damage you take by 40% for 8 sec.
Last Stand's cooldown is reduced by 60 sec and it grants you the Shield Block effect for its duration.

Blocking an attack deals 27,724 Physical damage to the attacker, ignoring armor. 

Generates high threat.
Shield Slam generates 2 more Rage and extends the duration of Shield Block by 1.0 sec.
Shield Block lasts 2 sec longer.
Every 20 Rage you spend reduces the remaining cooldown on Recklessness, Bladestorm, and Ravager by 1 sec.
Shield Slam reduces the remaining cooldown of Shield Wall by 6 sec.
Shield Slam deals 10% increased damage and reduces enemies' damage against you by 3% for 9 sec. Multiple punishments may overlap.
Increases Strength and Armor by 5% and your critical strike chance by 1%.
Increases Block chance by 12% and your Block value by 24%.
Increases Stamina and Armor by 8% and your Haste by 2%.

Charge to an enemy with your shield, dealing 378,325 Physical damage to it and 120,944 Physical damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

Also stuns the primary target for 4 sec.

Generates 20 Rage.
Your maximum health is increased by 6% and every 20 Rage you spend heals you for 1% of your maximum health.

Throws a whirling weapon at the target location that chases nearby enemies, inflicting 643,350 Physical damage to all enemies over 9.5 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 8 targets.

Generates 10 Rage each time it deals damage.
Shield Charge deals 20% increased damage, grants you Shield Block, and makes your next Revenge cost no Rage.

When your health is brought below 30%, you take 80% less damage for 8 sec and healing you receive is increased by 100%.

Cannot occur more than once every 3 min.
Bladestorm and Ravager's damage are reduced by 30% but they now have 2 charges and generate 10 additional Rage each time they deal damage.
Critical strike damage of your abilities is increased by 10% and the amount of damage blocked by your critical blocks is increased by 20%.

Colossal Might increases damage dealt by your next Demolish by 10%, stacking up to 5 times.

Shield Slam grants a stack of Colossal Might and Revenge grants a stack of Colossal Might when it strikes 3 or more targets.
Shockwave also knocks enemies into the air and its cooldown is reduced by 5 sec.
Shockwave, Revenge, and Whirlwind deal 5% more damage per target affected up to 5.
Colossal Might increases the damage of your Revenge by 7% per stack.

When your health is brought below 35%, you gain a Second Wind, healing you for 12% of your max health over 2 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 60 sec.
Shield Slam and Revenge damage increased by 10%.
Shield Slam critical strikes grant an additional stack of Colossal Might.

You deal 5% more damage and take 5.0% less damage.

Size increased by 5%.

Colossal Might now stacks up to 10 times. If you would gain a stack of Colossal Might and are at max stacks, the cooldown of Demolish is reduced by 2 sec.

Enemies affected by Demolish take up to 10% more damage from you and deal up to 10% less damage to you for 10 sec based on the number of stacks of Colossal Might consumed by Demolish.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A balanced combat state that increases the critical strike chance of your abilities by 3% and reduces the duration of movement impairing effects by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

A defensive combat state that reduces all damage you take by 15% and all damage you deal by 10%. 

Lasts until canceled.

Your auto-attacks generate 20% more Rage.

Killing an enemy instantly generates 5 Rage and increases your movement speed by 30% for 8 sec.
Leech increased by 3%.

Instantly attack the target, causing 53,466 damage and healing you for 30% of your maximum health.

Killing an enemy that yields experience or honor resets the cooldown of Impending Victory and makes it cost no Rage.
Leap through the air toward a target location, slamming down with destructive force to deal 21,490 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yards.
Hurls your weapon at an enemy, causing 25,397 Physical damage and stunning for 4 sec.

Restores 6% health every 1 sec when you have not taken damage for 5 sec.

Restores 1% health every 1 sec while you are below 35% health. The amount restored increases the closer you are to death.
Rampage has a 20% chance to immediately refund 10% of the Rage spent.
Blasts all enemies within 8 yards for 110,235 Physical damage and reduces their movement speed by 20% for 10 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.
Lets loose a rallying cry, granting all party or raid members within 40 yards 10% temporary and maximum health for 10 sec.
Sends a wave of force in a frontal cone, causing 18,012 damage and stunning all enemies within 10 yards for 2 sec.
Bloodthirst deals an additional 20% damage and deals 20% increased critical strike damage.
A vicious strike that deals 521,969 Physical damage and reduces the effectiveness of healing on the target by 50% for 10 sec.
Overpower the enemy, dealing 343,684 Physical damage. Cannot be blocked, dodged, or parried.
Overpower increases the damage of your next Mortal Strike or Cleave by 15%, stacking up to 2 times.
Increases your parry chance by 100% and reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.
Execute no longer has a cooldown and if your foe survives, 10% of the Rage spent is refunded.
Overpower has 2 charges and deals 15% more damage.
You are healed for 85% of the damage dealt by Deep Wounds.
Your attacks have a chance to make your next Execute cost no Rage, be usable on any target regardless of their health, and deal damage as if you spent 40 Rage.
You have a 1.0% chance per Rage spent on attacks to reset the remaining cooldown on Overpower.
Smashes the enemy's armor, dealing 275,642 Physical damage and increasing damage you deal to them by 30% for 10 sec.
Wounds the target, causing 114,912 Physical damage instantly and an additional 217,190 Bleed damage over 15 sec.
